price: Ali, oni su ga lažnim smatrali, pa smo spasili njega i one koji su bili uz njega u lađi, a one koji u ajete i znakove Naše nisu vjerovali - potopili. Uistinu, oni su pravi slijepci bili.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-anjaynāhu wa-alladhīna maʿahu fī al-ful'ki wa-aghraqnā alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā innahum kānū qawman ʿamīna
